name: Source of truth Design Deck
description:
Use this template as a source of truth for your next design project! Impactful designers are great at communicating design decisions and documenting design process. This is the deck to level up your communication and documentation process!


Includes sections on:


  • Introducing the problem space
  • Presenting interactive prototypes
  • Problems and opportunity
  • Product & design decisions
  • Research & discovery
  • Final Designs


Watch the accompanying video here.


Complete with component, device frames and text styles!
